page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: {School games. } Skittle ball is a game with two teams. Both boys and girls can play.You need a pitch with a line about ten to twelve metres long,and a circle about two metres in diameter at each end. There are seven people in each team with one skittle guard,two defenders, two centres and two attacks. By Lucy Bowden {Sports day. In summer we go to the playing field and have a sports day.Every time that you come first,second or third you get a badge and some points.At the end of the races we add up all the points and the person with the most points gets a silver cup. The runner up gets a second place cup. By Deborah Ellacott
